net.centro.rtb.monitoringcenter.metrics.tomcat

Interface TomcatConnectorStatus


  • public interface TomcatConnectorStatus
    This interface reflects the current readings for a Tomcat's connector. The values are collected from Tomcat's ThreadPool and GlobalRequestProcessor JMX beans. All metrics exposed by this class are immutable by the client.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.codahale.metrics.Gauge<Long> getActiveConnectionsGauge()
      Retrieves the number of active connections.
      com.codahale.metrics.Gauge<Integer> getBusyThreadsGauge()
      Retrieves the number of busy threads in the thread pool utilized by the connector.
      com.codahale.metrics.Gauge<Integer> getCurrentPoolSizeGauge()
      Retrieves the current number of threads in the thread pool utilized by the connector.
      com.codahale.metrics.Gauge<Integer> getMaxConnectionsGauge()
      Retrieves the maximum number of connections.
      com.codahale.metrics.Gauge<Integer> getMaxPoolSizeGauge()
      Retrieves the maximum size of the thread pool utilized by the connector.
      String getName()
      Retrieves the name of the connector.
      Integer getPort()
      Retrieves the port associated with the connector.
      com.codahale.metrics.Gauge<Integer> getQpsGauge()
      Retrieves the current request rate per second (QPS).
      com.codahale.metrics.Gauge<Integer> getTotalRequestsGauge()
      Retrieves the total number of requests processed by this connector.
      boolean isAjp()
      Indicates whether this connector is an AJP connector or not.
      boolean isInternalPort()
      Indicates whether this connector is deployed under internal port (a private port) or not.
      boolean isSecure()
      Indicates whether this connector is secure (SSL/TLS) or not.

    • Method Detail

      • getName

        String getName()
        Retrieves the name of the connector. For instance, "http-apr-80".
        Returns:
        the name of the connector.

      • getPort

        Integer getPort()
        Retrieves the port associated with the connector.
        Returns:
        the port associated with the connector; null if there was a problem retrieving the value via JMX.

      • isInternalPort

        boolean isInternalPort()
        Indicates whether this connector is deployed under internal port (a private port) or not.
        Returns:
        true if this connector is deployed under internal port; false otherwise or if unknown.

      • isSecure

        boolean isSecure()
        Indicates whether this connector is secure (SSL/TLS) or not.
        Returns:
        true if this connector is secure (SSL/TLS); false otherwise or if unknown.

      • isAjp

        boolean isAjp()
        Indicates whether this connector is an AJP connector or not.
        Returns:
        true if this connector is an AJP connector; false otherwise or if unknown.

      • getCurrentPoolSizeGauge

        com.codahale.metrics.Gauge<Integer> getCurrentPoolSizeGauge()
        Retrieves the current number of threads in the thread pool utilized by the connector.
        Returns:
        a gauge holding the current number of threads in the thread pool utilized by the connector; null if not available.

      • getMaxPoolSizeGauge

        com.codahale.metrics.Gauge<Integer> getMaxPoolSizeGauge()
        Retrieves the maximum size of the thread pool utilized by the connector.
        Returns:
        a gauge holding the maximum size of the thread pool utilized by the connector; null if not available.

      • getBusyThreadsGauge

        com.codahale.metrics.Gauge<Integer> getBusyThreadsGauge()
        Retrieves the number of busy threads in the thread pool utilized by the connector.
        Returns:
        a gauge holding the number of busy threads in the thread pool utilized by the connector; null if not available.

      • getActiveConnectionsGauge

        com.codahale.metrics.Gauge<Long> getActiveConnectionsGauge()
        Retrieves the number of active connections.
        Returns:
        a gauge holding the number of active connections; null if not available.

      • getMaxConnectionsGauge

        com.codahale.metrics.Gauge<Integer> getMaxConnectionsGauge()
        Retrieves the maximum number of connections.
        Returns:
        a gauge holding the maximum number of connections; null if not available.

      • getTotalRequestsGauge

        com.codahale.metrics.Gauge<Integer> getTotalRequestsGauge()
        Retrieves the total number of requests processed by this connector.
        Returns:
        a gauge holding the total number of requests processed by this connector; null if not available.

      • getQpsGauge

        com.codahale.metrics.Gauge<Integer> getQpsGauge()
        Retrieves the current request rate per second (QPS).
        Returns:
        a gauge holding the current request rate per second (QPS); null if not available.
